QuestData.Title: Illidari Freedom
QuestData.Description: <The Illidari demon hunter is bleeding from several ghastly wounds. It appears he was left here to die.>$B$BWithin the prison are three of my... <cough>... comrades.$B$BWe were taken by surprise while scouting the area.$B$BI am not long for this world, but please, save them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Sirius Ebonwing, Cassiel Nightthorn, and Asha Ravensong.
QuestData.RewardText: The other Illidari did not make it, but I owe you my life. There is one thing I learned during my time in the prisons: the demons within Black Rook Hold must die.
